topics.body: Like, Cardcaptor Sakura kind of suffered for not having enough plot. Kiba has TOO MUCH plot. It starts out slow, but then the pace just gets breakneck fast. And any time I start getting interested in a part of the story, it inexplicably changes the story or focus character.

It's an anime that I started watching that's just really fucking boring. It's the story of Zed. Zed gets spirited away to another world where he learns that he's a "Shard Caster." And there's some political stuff woth the three kingdoms, and his friend Noah is in the same world, and it's just kind of blase.

topics.body: And one of the biggest problems so far with Kiba is Zed himself. Zed is an ASSHOLE. He is an asshole in situations where NO ONE should be an asshole. He's also really fucking stupid. I mean he's sitting in a prison cell and a guy comes up to him and says "Yeah the charges against you are being dropped but you have to stay here tonight." And Zed is like "lol no" and then proceeds to bust out and get into EVEN MORE TROUBLE. *They were going to let you go you stupid fucking asshole!*
